Angela Flournoy bụ onye edemede America
Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi ya bụ The Turner House (2015) meriri First Novelist Award ma depụta ya maka National Book Award for Fiction, depụta ya na PEN / Robert W

Bingham Prize for Debut Fiction, họpụtara ya maka NAACP Image Award, ma kpọọ ya New York Times Notable Book of 2015. E depụtakwara ya na National Book Awards ' 5 n'okpuru 35 ndepụta, nke onye nkuzi ya ZZ Packer họpụtara.
A zụlitere Flournoy na Southern California

Nne ya si Los Angeles na nna ya si Detroit.  Flournoy gara Iowa Writer's Workshop na Mahadum nke Southern California. Ọ malitere ịmepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Turner House mgbe ọ na-aga Iowa Workshop, ebe ọ na-agakarị Detroit ileta ezinụlọ nna ya.

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Flournoy kụziri edemede maka Mahadum Iowa, Mahadum Trinity Washington, na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha DC. O bipụtara The Turner House na 2015. The New York Times kpọrọ ya "akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ na-adọrọ mmasị ma na-eto eto nke ukwuu..

nke e mesiri obi ike na nke a na-echefu echefu". BuzzFeed kọwara Flournoy dị ka "onye edemede mbụ a na-eto eto na America," na-ekwu maka ọtụtụ onyinye na nsọpụrụ ya, yana ahịa siri ike nke Turner House: "Dị ka Bookscan si kwuo, nke na-agbaso ihe dị ka 70% nke ahịa akwụkwọ US, akwụkwọ ya ereela ihe karịrị 15,000 na mpempe akwụkwọ na mkpuchi siri ike ka ọ dị na Eprel ; ihe ọ bụla karịrị 10,000 ka a na-ewere dị elu maka akụkọ ifo".
N'afọ 2020, e mere ndokwa ka ọ gaa njem ọgụgụ nke Ngalaba Na-akwado na Germany
Flournoy kagburu na obere oge n'etiti esemokwu ya na Iran ma bipụta nkwupụta na The New Yorker
Flournoy na-ekwu na nghọta ya banyere mmepe agwa sitere na Zora Neale Hurston Mules and Men.
